main event: Arvada police captured an unidentified flying object, which turned out to be a large plastic balloon floating eastward slowly, emitting no sound.
interesting points: The object appeared as a red light moving slowly, looking like a balloon with glass containers or garment bags.
The balloon was about 100 pounds and 8 feet in diameter, constructed with a wire mesh.
There had been UFO sightings reported in the Denver area for a week, most originating in the Golden and Lakewood areas.
The first sighting was reported to the Arvada Police Department at 8:38 pm, and the balloon was recovered by Arvada Patrolmen Daniel E. Bradley at 8:55 pm.
The report mentions that the balloon, when first sighted, appeared to have been made of plastic material inflated to gigantic size.
result: Identified as a large plastic balloon
